food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a tree.
💛 I am a curved fruit.
🐒 Monkeys say 'Ooh ooh aah aah!'

food.question: I am round and red or green. You can bite into me. Doctors recommend I keep you healthy. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on a tree or bush.
🍎 I am a popular fruit.
🥧 You can make a pie out of me.

food.question: I am white and cold. I am a yummy dessert. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am often eaten in a cone.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.
❄️ I melt if you don't eat me fast.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground.
🐰 Bunnies munch on me.
👀 I am good for your eyes.

food.question: I am little and green. I grow in a pod. You can eat me as a side dish. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am a vegetable.
👪 I sometimes come with the word 'sweet'.
🥄 You eat me with a spoon.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from a cow. I am white. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am good for your bones.
🐄 I come from cows.
🥣 You pour me on cereal.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. I can be round or square. You can put butter on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I can make a sandwich.
🔥 I need to be baked.
🧈 You can toast me and put butter on me.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin. I am brown on the outside and green inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have tiny black seeds.
🥄 You can scoop me out with a spoon.
🇨🇳 I originated from China.

food.question: I am a veggie. I can be purple, white, or green. You can fry, bake, or grill me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍆 I am related to tomatoes and potatoes.
🇮🇹 Some people call me an aubergine.
😋 I am sometimes served with parmesan cheese.

food.question: I'm made from roasted beans, people like to grind me. Then they add hot water for a drink, what could I be?

hints.text: ☕ Some people need me to wake up.
🌎 I'm grown in many different countries.
👨‍🍳 Baristas make me.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes cows eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I help make the ground soft.
🐄 Animals like to munch on me.
💚 I am the same color as a frog.

plant.question: I am round and red, and grow on a plant. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My color is like a fire truck.
🥗 I'm yummy in a salad!
☀️ I grow best in the sunshine.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I come in many colors.
🐝 Bees love my nectar.
💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk made of wood. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am very big and strong.
🐿️ Squirrels climb on me.
🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.

plant.question: I am long and yellow. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys peel me before they eat me.
💛 I am the color of the sun.
🍌 I am a yummy fruit.

plant.question: I am a crunchy orange vegetable. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!
🥕 I am good for your eyesight.
🥦 I grow under the ground and are orange.

plant.question: I am small and green and grow on a vine. You can eat me in a bunch. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am a tiny fruit!
💜 I can be purple or green.
🍷 Juice and jam are made from me.

plant.question: I have a prickly outside but a sweet inside. I grow in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 I wear a pointy crown.
🌴 I grow where it is hot.
🍹 My juice tastes great in a drink.

plant.question: I am a big fruit with a green outside and a red inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy and refreshing.
⚫ I have small black seeds you can spit out.
⛱️ Perfect for eating at the beach.

plant.question: I grow underground and have layers. I can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have many layers inside.
😢 I can make your eyes water.
🍔 I add flavor to food like burgers and soups.
